questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

B) A building
C) A mandrill
D) A group of people

B) A mandrill
C) A bench
D) A car

B) A beach
C) A rock wall
D) A cityscape

B) A river
C) A flower bed
D) A car

B) Sleeping
C) Sitting and looking at the camera

B) Wood
